TopicTitle: Anyone want to play some DMP and have a warfare?

Articles.Content:
/title

I have made some pretty neat craft so far, and I just want to have an all out war with other forumers, if you wanna join, here is a link to the modpack I created. All rights go to the original authors, as I am not a contributor of any of the following mods.

-I have removed the link for now, as I think a licensing issue made Squad remove the link. I will manually list all mods later. Sorry for the inconvenience.-

Once you got that downloaded, here is the server info:

IP: 71.208.243.106

Port: 6702

I'd recommend that unless you got a processor better than a Pentium G3200 (I live in the past) you should run KSP with the following parameters to force DirectX9:

-force-d3d9

Server comes back up tomorrow (1/8/18) at 3:00 PM EST

Edited January 8, 2018 by Darth C3P0
Ah man, too bad no one aint up to it.
Bump. Hosting again if anyone wants to join

link is broken
